akn:section.akn:heading: Art. 108. Military property of United States—Loss, damage, destruction, or wrongful disposition

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 908. Art. 108. Military property of United States—Loss, damage, destruction, or wrongful disposition Any person subject to this chapter who, without proper authority—(1) sells or otherwise disposes of;
(2) willfully or through neglect damages, destroys, or loses; or
(3) willfully or through neglect suffers to be lost, damaged, destroyed, sold, or wrongfully disposed of;
any military property of the United States, shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 71.)
